name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny
name_original: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny is a digital board game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Japan. It was originally released in 2003. Konami published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Yugi the Destiny is available on PC.
